colorTest.title: Color Test
colorTest.description: Select all the colors you like from the following options, making sure to choose the colors accurately and honestly to correctly calculate your compatibility.

contact.title: We're Here to Help!
contact.description: Have you faced a problem or have an inquiry? We're here to help! Reach out to us, and we'd love to hear from you and provide the support you need.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

aboutSec1.title: Find your perfect match with our unique color test at
aboutSec1.description: Our unique color test helps you find the ideal partner for marriage. Get personalized match percentages and connect with the one who truly suits you.

aboutVerify.title: Account Verification
aboutVerify.description: Verifying your account by providing accurate information helps to build trust with other users and confirms the validity of your details. It also makes it easier for service providers to reach you without the hassle of searching, making it simpler to find your ideal partner. For this reason, Arayes offers an account verification feature to ensure credibility and demonstrate seriousness.

ourGoal.title: Our Goal
ourGoal.description: Providing a safe and trustworthy environment for meeting and marriage, where individuals can search for their life partners within a framework of mutual trust and respect. We strive to build a connected society that upholds values and ethics, strengthens family and human bonds.

aboutFeatures.question: WHY CHOOSE US?
aboutFeatures.description: We are experts in helping young people get married and build stable families. We provide comprehensive services to ensure an ideal experience for members, while taking into account privacy and security.

home.title: Home
home.description: Find your perfect match with our unique color test at Arayes.

blogs.title: Blogs
blogs.description: Explore relationship advice and success stories at Arayes Blog.

services.title: Family Consultant Service
services.subtitle: We'll keep your family safe
services.description: A family consultant is an expert specialized in family relationships. The consultant analyzes various family issues and provides practical solutions tailored to each case. The role of the family consultant includes helping families communicate effectively, improving family relationships, enhancing trust among individuals, and offering guidance and advice to solve the problems they face. Questions can be submitted via the dedicated email for the service, and responses will be provided in a confidential manner, unless the participant wishes for others to benefit from the proposed solutions and their personal experience.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy policy sets out how our website uses and protects any information that you give us when you use this website.

infoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoWeCollect.intro: We may collect the following information:
infoWeCollect.name: Your name, contact details, and any personal information you provide during the registration process.
infoWeCollect.demographics: Information about you such as age, gender, and location.
infoWeCollect.otherInfo: Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers

howWeUse.title: How We Use the Information
howWeUse.intro: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons:
howWeUse.promotionalEmails: Sending promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information which we think you may find interesting.
howWeUse.marketResearch: From time to time, we may also use your information to contact you for market research purposes.

security.title: Security
security.description: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: A cookie is a small file that asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added, and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site.
cookies.additionalInfo: Overall, cookies help us provide you with a better website by enabling us to monitor which pages you find useful and which you do not.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.description: Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other website.

controllingYourInfo.title: Controlling Your Personal Information
controllingYourInfo.intro: You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways:
controllingYourInfo.changeMarketing: If you have previously agreed to us using your personal information for direct marketing purposes, you may change your mind at any time by writing to or emailing us.
controllingYourInfo.noSale: We will not sell, distribute, or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so.
controllingYourInfo.requestDetails: You may request details of personal information which we hold about you.
controllingYourInfo.correctInfo: Correction of Information: You can correct your personal information directly in your account settings.

privacyPolicy.note: This privacy policy is subject to change with notice.
